titles.title: A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from minting or issuing 1-cent coins.
A bill to amend title 31, United States Code, to prohibit the Secretary of the Treasury from minting or issuing 1-cent coins.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs
